body_html:
(Tests are failing because of the BUILD file formatting (see logs).

Please fix those and you should be good to go. Thanks!
Details:

=== Sanity check step 3 of 10: do_buildifier (buildifier check) ===

Running do_buildifier on 208 files

tensorflow/contrib/rnn/BUILD # reformat 

buildifier took 0 s

FAIL: buildifier found errors and/or warnings in above BUILD files.
buildifier suggested the following changes:
29,30c29,31
<     srcs = ["__init__.py"] + glob(["python/ops/*.py"]) 
<                            + ["python/tools/checkpoint_convert.py"],
---
>     srcs = ["__init__.py"] + glob(["python/ops/*.py"]) + [
>         "python/tools/checkpoint_convert.py",
>     ],
Please fix manually or run buildifier <file> to auto-fix.

body:
(Tests are failing because of the BUILD file formatting (see [logs](https://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-pull-requests-sanity/5418/consoleFull)).  

Please fix those and you should be good to go. Thanks!
Details:

```
=== Sanity check step 3 of 10: do_buildifier (buildifier check) ===

Running do_buildifier on 208 files

tensorflow/contrib/rnn/BUILD # reformat 

buildifier took 0 s

FAIL: buildifier found errors and/or warnings in above BUILD files.
buildifier suggested the following changes:
29,30c29,31
<     srcs = ["__init__.py"] + glob(["python/ops/*.py"]) 
<                            + ["python/tools/checkpoint_convert.py"],
---
>     srcs = ["__init__.py"] + glob(["python/ops/*.py"]) + [
>         "python/tools/checkpoint_convert.py",
>     ],
Please fix manually or run buildifier <file> to auto-fix.
```
